entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. kromi:ConsolidatedNetLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:Equity of 21,437,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 21,434,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:Equity that should add to 21,437,000 are comprised of the following:
+ EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent 21,434,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Equity Total Value : 21,437,000 Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900L3GACMYY4MMX62/2021-06-30/ESEF/DE/0/kromi.zip/kromi/reports/529900L3GACMYY4MMX62-2021-06-30-de.xhtml 3710

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent of 21,434,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -2,990,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent that should add to 21,434,000 are comprised of the following:
+ ConsolidatedNetLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent -2,990,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent Total Value : 21,434,000 Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900L3GACMYY4MMX62/2021-06-30/ESEF/DE/0/kromi.zip/kromi/reports/529900L3GACMYY4MMX62-2021-06-30-de.xhtml 3716

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities of 41,851,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 21,437,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities that should add to 41,851,000 are comprised of the following:
+ Equity 21,437,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung - Geamtkostenverfahren. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
